title: GL-Watchlist
subtitle: Next, Firebase, TypeScript, Google Analytics
description: GL-Watchlist is a comprehensive web platform dedicated to curating and organizing girl-love (GL) content across various media, including series, movies, and music videos. Built with Next.js, Firebase, and TypeScript, this project enables users to effortlessly explore, filter, and stay updated on the latest GL content. The site features user-generated reviews, ratings, and a sophisticated search functionality, all while integrating Google Analytics to track user engagement and improve the overall experience. GL-Watchlist aims to be the go-to resource for fans of GL media, offering a user-friendly and visually appealing interface that enhances content discovery.

title: The Lounge - Desktop
subtitle: Electron, Next, Firebase, Node, SocketIO
description: Welcome to 'The Lounge - Desktop,' an exclusive platform designed to redefine the way communities interact and engage. Offering a unique blend of privacy and connectivity, it's the ideal space for those who value dynamic, real-time communication in a sophisticated desktop environment. Perfect for groups seeking a tailored interaction space.

title: The Lounge - Web
subtitle: Next, Firebase, Node, SocketIO
description: Discover 'The Lounge - Web,' where community engagement meets modern convenience. This platform offers a seamless web-based experience for users seeking interactive, real-time communication. It's crafted for communities, teams, and groups who desire a flexible, accessible space to come together online.

title: Untitled Messaging Service
subtitle: React Native, Firebase, Node, AWS, openAI, JavaScript, SocketIO, Figma
description: Embark on the next generation of communication with our Untitled Messaging Service. This platform breaks new ground with features that blend privacy, intuitive design, and AI-driven functionality, offering a messaging experience that's both personal and expansive.

title: WalletWize
subtitle: React Native, TypeScript, APIs, Figma
description: As a contributor to the WalletWize app, I helped shape a financial management tool that empowers users to take control of their finances directly from their phones. WalletWize simplifies budgeting, spending tracking, and financial planning, making it easier for users to achieve their financial goals.

title: Reflectica Dashboard
subtitle: Next, TypeScript, Figma
description: In the early stages of Reflectica, I contributed to developing a psychotherapy platform aimed at fostering personal growth and self-reflection. Designed to support users on their journey towards mental well-being, Reflectica combines the convenience of a phone app with the depth of psychotherapeutic techniques.

title: Reflectica Phone Application
subtitle: React Native, Node, JavaScript, TypeScript, Figma
description: In the early stages of Reflectica, I contributed to developing a psychotherapy platform aimed at fostering personal growth and self-reflection. Designed to support users on their journey towards mental well-being, Reflectica combines the convenience of a phone app with the depth of psychotherapeutic techniques.

title: Pefi
subtitle: MongoDB, Express, React, Node.Js, GraphQL
description: Pefi, the comprehensive personal finance management app, empowers users to oversee their finances with ease. From budgeting to goal-setting, Pefi transforms financial planning into an engaging, informative journey, helping users navigate their economic world with confidence.

title: Food Genie
subtitle: MongoDB, Express, React, Node.Js, GraphQL
description: Eliminate mealtime indecision with Food Genie, your personal culinary guide. It's designed to simplify the choice process, offering spontaneous dining suggestions based on your preferences. Food Genie is the perfect companion for food lovers seeking new flavors and experiences.

title: Chris Hong Portfolio
subtitle: React, JavaScript, Bootstrap
description: My digital portfolio is a testament to my professional journey, showcasing projects that exemplify my commitment to innovation and quality. It's a space where creativity meets technology, inviting viewers to explore my contributions to digital solutions and connect for future collaborations.

title: DogHub
subtitle: Express, Handlebars, MySQL, and MVC model
description: DogHub offers a vibrant community for dog lovers to connect, share, and meet. My role in creating DogHub was to provide a platform where users can easily find playmates for their pets and exchange care tips, making pet ownership a shared, joyful experience.

title: E-Commerce Backend
subtitle: Node.Js, MySQL & Express
description: A robust backend for e-commerce operations, streamlining product management, orders, and customer interactions. This project is foundational for online stores seeking efficiency and scalability in their digital presence.

title: Snake Game
subtitle: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
description: This modern take on the classic Snake Game combines nostalgia with fresh challenges. Designed for casual gaming, it's an engaging way to pass the time, challenging players to beat their high scores in a familiar yet refreshed digital environment.
